item.title:
"The Magic 1089"
1. Write down a 3 digit number where the digits are decreasing (e.g. 421) 2. Reverse that number and subtract it from the first number 3. Take that answer and add the reverse to itself 4. 1089 will appear! https://t.co/RlqJ6xu6B6
